oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Apollo 16 - Moon travel tapes - Tape 1 Side 4
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Tape 1 (Side 4). Program sent on the Apollo 16 space mission for Charlie Duke's (astronaut) enjoyment. Originally from a cassette Tape. Tape featuring Bill Bailey (host), Chet Atkins, Jerry Reed, Floyd Cramer, and Jordanaires (Music Group).
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Bill Bailey; Chet Atkins; Jerry Reed; Floyd Cramer; Jordanaires
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Bill Bailey opening remarks addressing the Apollo 16 crew and introduces Chet Atkins, Jerry Reed, and Floyd Cramer -- (00:36) Chet Atkins introduce themselves and introduce Jerry Reeds first song -- (01:17) You Took All the Rambling Out of Me (Jerry Reed) -- (02:05) Chet Atkins and Jerry Reed introduce Kentucky -- (03:50) Kentucky (Chet Atkins) -- (06:50) Chet Atkins and Jerry Reed introduce Floyd Cramer who addresses astronauts -- (07:29) It's Impossible (Floyd Cramer) -- (10:12) Chet Atkins and Jerry Reed addresses Floyd Cramer's Speech and introduces "A Thing Called Love" (11:07) A Thing Called Love (Jerry Reed) -- (13:18) Chet Atkins and Jerry Reed introduce "The Red, White, and Blue Medley" -- (14:15) The Red, White, and Blue Medley (Chet Atkins) -- (17:46) Chet Atkins and Jerry Reed introduce Floyd Cramer who addresses astronauts -- (18:08) The Sounds of Sunday (Floyd Cramer with The Jordanaires) -- (20:08) Chet Atkins and Jerry Reed praise Floyd and introduce "Another Puff" -- (21:07) Another Puff (Jerry Reed) -- (24:59) Chet Atkins and Jerry Reed joke about space travel and introduce "Jerry's Breakdown" -- (26:14) Jerry's Breakdown (Chet Atkins and Jerry Reed) -- (28:19) Jerry Reed and Chet Atkins closing comments -- (28:57) Floyd Cramer gives closing comments (29:06) Bill Bailey closing remarks
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Bailey, Bill; Bailey, Bill, 1965-; Atkins, Chet; Reed, Jerry; Cramer, Floyd; Cramer, Floyd, 1933-1997; Jordanaires (Musical group);
